memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned max_cluster_count, uint64_t max_cluster_size, uint64_t acceptable_iters) noexcept
memberdef.name: MakeTxGraph

detaileddescription.para: Construct a new TxGraph with the specified limit on the number of transactions within a cluster, and on the sum of transaction sizes within a cluster. max_cluster_count cannot exceed MAX_CLUSTER_COUNT_LIMIT. acceptable_iters controls how many linearization optimization steps will be performed per cluster before they are considered to be of acceptable quality.
